metadata.title: CVE-2021-40574 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The binary MP4Box in Gpac 1.0.1 has a double-free vulnerability in thegf_text_get_utf8_line function in load_text.c, which allows attackers tocause a denial of service, even code execution and escalation ofprivileges.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
